properties.areaDesc: Henry, TN; Benton, TN; Stewart, TN; Houston, TN; Humphreys, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 11 at 1:39PM CST until February 15 at 4:38PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Tennessee River...

Tennessee River at Johnsonville affecting Benton...Henry...
Houston...Humphreys and Stewart Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Tennessee River at Johnsonville
* from Tuesday February 11 until Saturday February 15.
* At 12 PM Tuesday the stage was 359.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 361.5 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 361.0 feet Saturday February
15.
* At 361.5 feet...Low lying portions of Old Johnsonville Rd near the
Battle of Johnsonville Park begin to flood, and water approaches
some of the parking areas and campgrounds at Masons Boat Dock near
Waverly.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
